channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I'm new to this whole Moparscape and such scene, but i've heard good things, and i would like to kno exactly step-by-step how to get on and start playing.
So far i've only played by my self and it wasnt that good...
Can someone tell me exactly what I have to do to play this? Do I need to download a server?

item.title: Help

i would but im too busy eating a double quarter pounder w/cheese xD
